### AreEquivalentAddressValues() {#a164ac7020f49ac06e715ef42442ab17d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool AreEquivalentAddressValues (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; B)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Test if A and B will obviously have the same value.

This includes recognizing that t0 and t1 will have the same value in code like this: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">%t0 = getelementptr \\@a, 0, 3</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">store i32 0, i32&#42; %t0</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">%t1 = getelementptr \\@a, 0, 3</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">%t2 = load i32&#42; %t1</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

Definition at line <a href="#l00258">258</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loads-cpp">Loads.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When using something like !dereferenceable on a load, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dereferenceability may only be valid on a specific control-flow path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the instruction doesn&#39;t dominate the context instruction, we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// asking about dereferenceability under the assumption that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction has been speculated to the point of the context instruction,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in which case we don&#39;t know if the dereferenceability info still holds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t bother handling allocas here, as they aren&#39;t speculatable</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsKnownDeref()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As we recursed through GEPs to get here, we&#39;ve incrementally checked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that each step advanced by a multiple of the alignment. If our base is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// properly aligned, then the original offset accessed must also be.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a25f1d7ccf87af8d87fcb950f7ed758b5">isAligned</a>(V, Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// TODO refactor this function to be able to search independently for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Dereferencability and Alignment requirements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallBase&gt;</a>(V)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: We can only use the object size as a base fact as we a) need to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objectsizeopts">ObjectSizeOpts</a> Opts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: It may be okay to round to align, but that would imply that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accessing slightly out of bounds was legal, and we&#39;re currently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inconsistent about that.  For the moment, be conservative.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !V-&gt;canBeFreed()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When dereferenceability information is provided by a dereferenceable</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Test if A and B will obviously have the same value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This includes recognizing that %t0 and %t1 will have the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// value in code like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %t0 = getelementptr \\@a, 0, 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   store i32 0, i32&#42; %t0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %t1 = getelementptr \\@a, 0, 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %t2 = load i32&#42; %t1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258" lineLink="#a164ac7020f49ac06e715ef42442ab17d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a164ac7020f49ac06e715ef42442ab17d">AreEquivalentAddressValues</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Test if the values are trivially equivalent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Test if the values come from identical arithmetic instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use isIdenticalToWhenDefined instead of isIdenticalTo because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this function is only used when one address use dominates the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other, which means that they&#39;ll always either have the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value or one of them will have an undefined value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;BinaryOperator&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CastInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;GetElementPtrInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise they may not be equivalent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, be a little bit aggressive by scanning the local block where we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// want to check to see if the pointer is already being loaded or stored</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from/to.  If so, the previous load or store would have already trapped,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so there is no harm doing an extra load (also, CSE will later eliminate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the load entirely).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> BBI = ScanFrom-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       E = ScanFrom-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()-&gt;begin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"></CodeLine>
